business.headline: LPG cylinder prices hiked by Rs 50 for both subsidised, non-subsidised consumersThe government has hiked LPG prices to recover past losses, pushing up household cooking costs at a time of rising economic uncertainty and global trade tensions.

After Trump, EU wants India to remove tariffs on car imports: ReportThe European Union is pressing India to eliminate steep import tariffs on automobiles under a long-delayed trade deal , with India signalling a willingness to offer more attractive terms.

Sensex closes 2,200 points lower as Dalal Street logs worst session in 10 monthsStock market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 2226.79 points lower at 73,137.90, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 742.85 points to trade at settle at 22,161.60. Most of the broader market indices also crashed during the extremely volatile trading session.

Excise duty on petrol, diesel increased by Rs 2; no impact on consumersThe move comes at a time when global crude oil prices are actually on a downward trend, driven by fears of a global trade war sparked by the US administration's reciprocal tariffs.

Apple flies iphones from India and China to dodge Trump's tariffs: ReportApple is closely studying how different tariff rules in various countries could impact its supply chain. The US remains one of Apple's key markets, and the company is trying to avoid passing on higher costs to customers.

$10 billion wiped out: India's richest 4 take a hit in stock market crashThe country's top four billionaires, Mukesh Ambani, Gautam Adani, Savitri Jindal & family, and Shiv Nadar, together lost over $10 billion as markets around the world fell sharply.

What is 'Black Monday' stock market crash? Know why it's making headlines againOn Friday, April 4, 2025, the US stock market had its worst day since the Covid-19 crash. More than $5 trillion was erased in a matter of hours as stocks plummeted, and volatility soared.

Stock market crash: What should investors do as Trump tariffs batter portfolios?Dalal Street is bleeding as global turmoil deepens amid Trump's tariff shock. Read on to find out what investors should do now amid the chaos and confusion.

India's worst stock market crashes: From Covid-19 to Trump tariffsOn Monday, April 7, the Indian stock market faced one of its biggest falls since June 2024. The Sensex fell nearly 4,000 points, while the Nifty 50 slipped below 21,750, dragging down investor confidence.

Stock market crash: Which sectors have been hit hardest today?All sectors ended deep in the red, triggering sharp wealth erosion for investors. Some bore steeper losses than others. Here's a breakdown of the hardest-hit sectors in today's session.

Explained: Why Tata Motors share price fell 10% todayTata Motors share price: Tata Motors' stock has seen a steady decline over the past few months. It has fallen by 17.12% in the last five trading days alone. In the past six months, the stock is down by 39.42%. Over the last one year, it has lost 44.50% of its value.

Sensex plunges 3,000 points: 5 reasons behind stock market crashShare market crash: Dalal Street is facing its worst trading session in a year, as Donald Trump's tariff shock has sparked a global rout and reignited fears of a looming recession.

entertainment.headline: Tamannaah Bhatia shooting dance number for Raid 2, but not with Honey SinghActor Tamannaah Bhatia has been shooting for a special dance number in 'Raid 2'. However, as opposed to the viral reports, she has not collaborated with Honey Singh for the same.

Sonu Sood's video message for drivers after wife Sonali's road accidentDays after Sonu Sood's wife, Sonali, was injured in a road accident, the actor shared an important message for all drivers. The video message highlights the importance of seat belts for passengers sitting at the back of the car.

Actor Aaditi Pohankar opens up about performing intimate scenes with Bobby DeolActor Aaditi Pohankar recently spoke to India Today Digital about sharing screen space with Ashram co-star Bobby Deol. Pohankar shared how she broke the ice with Deol on the set of the show.

TV legend Jay North dies at 73 after long cancer battleJay North, beloved star of the classic TV show Dennis the Menace, has died at 73 after battling colon cancer. He will always be remembered for the wonderful work he did.

Baeksang Awards 2025 full nominees list: When Life Gives You Tangerines leadsThe 61st Baeksang Arts Awards nominations highlight a fierce competition in Korean film and television, with When Life Gives You Tangerines leading with nine nods across major categories. Other notable contenders include Lovely Runner, Doubt, and Love in the Big City in both acting and film categories.

Tamannaah Bhatia shares why age gap doesn't affect her friendship with Rasha ThadaniActor Tamannaah Bhatia shares a profound bond with actor Rasha Thadani. In a recent interview, she addressed the age gap between them and what defines her friendships.
Kim Soo-hyun's scenes removed from G-Dragon's show Good DayK-drama star Kim Soo-hyun's segment has been completely removed from the ongoing variety show Good Day, amid the Kim Sae-ron death scandal.

Priyanka-Nick make stylish statement in black at The Last Five Years opening showPriyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas made a stylish entry at the Broadway opening of the singer's show, The Last Five Years, in New York City.

Ground Zero trailer: Emraan Hashmi wages war in Kashmir-set thrillerThe high-octane trailer of the upcoming film Ground Zero is out. Starring Emraan Hashmi in the lead role, the gripping film is set against the backdrop of conflict-ridden Kashmir, and will release on April 25.

Suits LA Episode 7 review: Talks the talk but doesn't walk the walk 'Suits LA' is getting nowhere, it seems. After Ted Black wins his trial, there's a sudden rush of overwhelming happiness in him and around him. Everything has turned happy in the show, and while we are not against sweetness, this is not the world of 'Suits'. We like our conflicts here, no?

Farah Khan, Veer Pahariya nail viral one-leg dance move: Been dying to do thisFarah Khan and Veer Pahariya join forces in a viral dance trend, showcasing the popular one-leg move from the song 'Rang' in a recent Instagram reel.

The White Lotus S3 finale review: Bloody, chaotic and weirdly enlighteningReleased-Sun Apr 06, 2025The White Lotus Season 3, streaming on JioHotstar, is a worthy follow-up but doesn't create the same magic as it did with the first two seasons. The latest season struggled to find a unifying theme.

Tom Cruise praises Brad Pitt's driving skills, eager to see F1Hollywood star Tom Cruise has praised former co-star Brad Pitt's driving skills in a new interview. The actors had previously shared screen space in Interview with the Vampire (1994).

Karma review: A sharp, gritty tangle of fate and retributionReleased-Fri Apr 04, 2025Karma Kdrama review: The series delves into the intricacies of fate intertwined with retribution in a sharp and gritty narrative. Itmasterfully portrays the consequences of actions through its compelling storyline.

Filmmaker Tahira Kashyap's breast cancer relapses, says 'Round 2, but I got this'Tahira Kashyap said she's 'still got this' while expressing her positive outlook towards life in a post mentioning her battle with breast cancer for the second time.

Malavika Mohanan slams fan for questioning age gap between her and MohanlalActor Malavika Mohanan has slammed the internet for raising questions about her and co-star Mohanlal's age gap. The two will soon be seen sharing screen space in the Malayalam film Hridayapoorvam.

Indian Idol 15 winner Manasi Ghosh: Want to collab with AR Rahman, Sonu NigamKolkata's Manasi Ghosh was crowned the winner of Indian Idol 15 on Sunday. In an exclusive chat, she shared her aspirations of collaborating with music legends like AR Rahman and Sonu Nigam. She emphasised her journey of hard work, diverse singing capabilities, and future plans.

Jaya Bachchan loses cool at elderly fan during Manoj Kumar's prayer meetAt the prayer tribute for the late Manoj Kumar in Mumbai, a video of Jaya Bachchan's interaction with an elderly woman went viral, sparking reactions on social media. The veteran actor appeared miffed when the fan requested a photo.

This is critical as the party tries to take Baby steps towards revival ahead of crucial elections in its strongholds.

Kunal Kamra's interim protection from arrest extended in Shinde jibe rowThe Madras High Court on Monday extended comedian Kunal Kamra's interim protection from arrest, which was set to end today, until April 27, in connection with an FIR lodged in Mumbai over his 'traitor' jibe at Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde.

Mohammed Siraj joins Jasprit Bumrah in prestigious IPL list after 4/17 vs SRHMohammed Siraj joined Jasprit Bumrah in an elite list of bowlers as he picked up career-best figures of 4 for 17 during the SRH vs GT clash on Sunday, April 6. Siraj has been in sensational form since joining GT.

IPL 2025: Sundar, Siraj special adds to Hyderabad's agony as Gujarat march onGujarat Titans beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by seven wickets in Match 19 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) and registered their third consecutive win of the season. Mohammed Siraj (4/17) and Washington Sundar (49 off 29) were the top two performers for Gujarat.

David has scored back-to-back fiery knocks against Chennai Super Kings (CSK) and Gujarat Titans (GT).

Rohit Sharma deemed fit for RCB clash by MI coach Jayawardene: He looks goodMumbai Indians coach Mahela Jayawardene has said that Rohit Sharma is fit for the clash against Royal Challengers Bengaluru on Monday, April 7. Rohit had missed the last game due to a knee injury.

IPL 2025: Sundar makes debut for GT, Unadkat replaces Harshal Patel in SRHGujarat Titans and Sunrisers Hyderabad have made one change each to their playing XI ahead of Match 19 in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). GT handed debut cap to Washington Sundar while Jaydev Unadkat replaced an ill Harshal Patel in SRH.

Jasprit Bumrah lifted up by Kieron Pollard, fans say 'handle with care'Kieron Pollard was elated to see Jasprit Bumrah back with MI as the Mumbai batting coach lifted the pacer in the air ahead of the practice session. Brand Dhoni is alive: Ex-player wants MS to stay amid retirement rumoursFormer cricketer Sreevats Goswami has said that MS Dhoni should continue to play in the Indian Premier League. Goswami's comments come amidst rumours of Dhoni's retirement.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.
